PAGE._title: Trang bìa

TEXT._text:
By the end of the lesson, Ss will be able to 
- Use lexical items related to hobbies. 
- Pronounce the sounds / ə / and / ɜ :/ in context.

PAGE._title: 1. Objectives

TEXT._text: Repeat the words / phrases indicating the hobbies we learnt in the previous lesson.

-Playing board games

-Taking photos

-Bird-watching

-Cycling

-Playing the guitar

-Gardening

-Cooking

-Arranging flowers

-Skating

PAGE._title: 2. Repeat the words/ phrases indicating the hobbies we learnt in the previous lesson.

PAGE._title: Suggestion matching

TEXT._text: 2. Fill in each blank in the sentences with one hobby or one action verb from the box.

PAGE._title: 2. Fill in each blank in the sentences with one hobby orone action verb from the box.

TEXT._text:
1. I like _____. There is a pool near my home, so I go there four times a week and _____. It is fun because you can play in the water and keep fit at the same time.

2. I always _____ to Ngoc's songs. I love sweet melodies. At home, I haveto use my headphones, because my parents don't like loud noise. _____ is favourite my hobby.

3. I love being outdoors with the trees and flowers. There is a small garden behind my house. I _____ flowers and vegetables there. I like _____ a lot.

4. My father and I share the same hobby. At weekend, we usually go to  a small lake in Ha Tay. It's exciting when you can _____ some fishes for dinner. We love _____!

5. My sister's favourite hobby is _____. She is very creative and she _____ very well. I like the colours in her pictures.

PAGE._title: Read the senteces

WHICHWORD.DRAG_DROP:
1. I like swimming. There is a pool near my home, so I go there four times a week and swim. 
It is fun because you can play in the water and keep fit at the same time.
2. I always listen to Ngoc's songs. I love sweet melodies. At home, I haveto 
use my headphones, because my parents don't like loud noise. listening to music

PAGE._title: Suggestion fill in each blank in the sentences

WHICHWORD.DRAG_DROP:
3. I love being outdoors with the trees and flowers. There is a small garden behind my house.
I plant flowers and vegetables there. I like gardening a lot.
4. My father and I share the same hobby. At weekend, we usually go to  a small lake in Ha Tay. It's 
exciting when you can catch some fishes for dinner. We love fishing!
5. My sister's favourite hobby is painting. She is very creative and she paints very well. 
I like the  colours in her pictures.

PAGE._title: Suggestion fill in each blank in the sentences

TEXT._text: 3. Write down keywords to describe the hobbies in the table.
lake, exciting, catch, fish, water, boat…

PAGE._title: 3. Write down keywords to describe the hobbies in the table.

TEXT._text: Keyword help you understand a text quicly and take good notes! Learn how to indentify them and keep practising

PAGE._title: * Look out

TEXT._text: 4. Game: THE KEYS TO MY HOBBY!

1. Work in groups.
2. Each student think of hobby and says the keywords out loud.
3. The rest of the group tries to guess what the hobby is. One point is given for each correct guess.
4. The sudent with the most points is the winner.

A: water, grow, flowers, vegetables

B: Is it gardening?

A: Yes, it is.

PAGE._title: 4. Game: The keys to my hobby!

TEXT._text: Suggestion: The keys to my hobby!
A: No, it isn't. It is painting.
2. A: Pool, fun, keep fit, swim
3. A: lake, exciting, catch, fish, water, boat…

PAGE._title: Suggestion: The keys to my hobby!

TEXT._text: 7. Listen to the sentences and tick / ə / or / ɜ :/. Practise the sentences.

answer._value: 1. His hobby is collecting toy cars.
2. My sister has alot of photos.
3. When I have free time, I usually go surfing
